import React from 'react'; const Skills = () => { const skillCategories = [ { category: "Frontend Development", skills: [ { name: "React.js", level: 90 }, { name: "JavaScript (ES6+)", level: 95 }, { name: "HTML5 & CSS3", level: 90 }, { name: "TypeScript", level: 85 }, { name: "Tailwind CSS", level: 88 }, { name: "Next.js", level: 80 } ] }, { category: "Backend Development", skills: [ { name: "Node.js", level: 85 }, { name: "Express.js", level: 88 }, { name: "Python", level: 80 }, { name: "MongoDB", level: 82 }, { name: "PostgreSQL", level: 75 }, { name: "RESTful APIs", level: 90 } ] }, { category: "Tools & Technologies", skills: [ { name: "Git & GitHub", level: 92 }, { name: "Docker", level: 70 }, { name: "AWS", level: 75 }, { name: "Firebase", level: 85 }, { name: "Figma", level: 80 }, { name: "VS Code", level: 95 } ] } ]; const softSkills = [ "Problem Solving", "Team Collaboration", "Agile Methodology", "Project Management", "Communication", "Time Management", "Continuous Learning", "Attention to Detail" ]; return (
